name: Final Fantasy IV
overview: Follow the dark knight Cecil - Lord Captain of Baron's elite force, the Red Wings - as he embarks on a fateful journey riddled with trials, betrayals, friendship, loss and self-discovery. Plagued with uncertainty over his monarch's motives, can Cecil turn away from the path of darkness and destruction? • Fully remade in 3D with new graphics and voiceovers • Witness gorgeous, all-new CG cutscenes • Updated battle system retains its original feel while elevating visual effects to an entirely new level
